description:
Removes the number of array elements given in the parameter `length`, starting from the element at the index given in the parameter `index`.

All elements after the given index get a new index assigned so that the indices are always sequence of numbers with the step size of 1 and starting at 0. Labels assigned to the individual values are not affected.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first element to remove.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The number of elements to remove from the array. Defaults to `1`.

returns.description: An array with values being removed. The number of elements get reduced by the number given in the parameter `length`.
